name: Super Duper pt2
description:
CONTROLS

  • ESC - quit
  • BACKSPACE - return to main menu
  • LEFT MOUSE - fireballs baby
  • RIGHT MOUSE - send a clone to a spot
  • F - duplicate!
  • SPACE - focus fire
  • SHIFT - rejoin the clones

Our boy Steve is a mage and can duplicate himself!  Or.. is it a true duplication?

Turns out this is a useful skill in the game of Mage Ball!  See how long you can survive the onslaught!  Charge up the Mage Ball and let-er-whirl for some extra spicy damage!

Hope you have some fun!

TWITTER   -   YOUTUBE
